Images

What it is

An HTML image tag (optionally wrapped in div elements) to display images.

Specs

CSS Class: .x-img

Ext.Img

Extends from Ext.Component

  • src

  • alt

  • autoEl

  • height

  • width

  • margin

  • padding

  • baseCls

  • imgCls

Example

Ext.create('Ext.Img', {
    src: 'http://www.sencha.com/img/20110215-feat-html5.png',
    renderTo: Ext.getBody()
});
